description: Tristan Jaxx, Mason Wyler, Todd Welch & Colby Taylor. This hungry quartet finds themselves poolside and itching to go. Tristan pairs off with Mason, while Colby takes Todd on and the two sets of eager studs compete to see who can out-suck, out-fuck, out-rim and out-sex the other, until they switch partners to carry on even more.
title: Endless Crush
